object.name: ChatFullInfo
object.description: This object contains full information about a chat.
object.html_description: This object contains full information about a chat.
object.rst_description: This object contains full information about a chat.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for this chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: Type of the chat, can be either 'private', 'group', 'supergroup' or 'channel'
annotations.html_description: Type of the chat, can be either “private”, “group”, “supergroup” or “channel”
annotations.rst_description: Type of the chat, can be either 'private', 'group', 'supergroup' or 'channel'
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Title, for supergroups, channels and group chats
annotations.html_description: Optional. Title, for supergroups, channels and group chats
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Title, for supergroups, channels and group chats
annotations.name: title

annotations.description: Username, for private chats, supergroups and channels if available
annotations.html_description: Optional. Username, for private chats, supergroups and channels if available
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Username, for private chats, supergroups and channels if available
annotations.name: username

annotations.description: First name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. First name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. First name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.name: first_name

annotations.description: Last name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. Last name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Last name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.name: last_name

annotations.description: True, if the supergroup chat is a forum (has topics enabled)
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the supergroup chat is a forum (has topics enabled)
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the supergroup chat is a forum (has `topics <https://telegram.org/blog/topics-in-groups-collectible-usernames#topics-in-groups>`_ enabled)
annotations.name: is_forum

annotations.description: True, if the chat is the direct messages chat of a channel
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the chat is the direct messages chat of a channel
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the chat is the direct messages chat of a channel
annotations.name: is_direct_messages

annotations.description: Identifier of the accent color for the chat name and backgrounds of the chat photo, reply header, and link preview. See accent colors for more details.
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the accent color for the chat name and backgrounds of the chat photo, reply header, and link preview. See accent colors for more details.
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the accent color for the chat name and backgrounds of the chat photo, reply header, and link preview. See `accent colors <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#accent-colors>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: accent_color_id

annotations.description: The maximum number of reactions that can be set on a message in the chat
annotations.html_description: The maximum number of reactions that can be set on a message in the chat
annotations.rst_description: The maximum number of reactions that can be set on a message in the chat
annotations.name: max_reaction_count

annotations.description: Chat photo
annotations.html_description: Optional. Chat photo
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Chat photo
annotations.name: photo

annotations.description: If non-empty, the list of all active chat usernames; for private chats, supergroups and channels
annotations.html_description: Optional. If non-empty, the list of all active chat usernames; for private chats, supergroups and channels
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. If non-empty, the list of all `active chat usernames <https://telegram.org/blog/topics-in-groups-collectible-usernames#collectible-usernames>`_; for private chats, supergroups and channels
annotations.name: active_usernames

annotations.description: For private chats, the date of birth of the user
annotations.html_description: Optional. For private chats, the date of birth of the user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For private chats, the date of birth of the user
annotations.name: birthdate

annotations.description: For private chats with business accounts, the intro of the business
annotations.html_description: Optional. For private chats with business accounts, the intro of the business
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For private chats with business accounts, the intro of the business
annotations.name: business_intro

annotations.description: For private chats with business accounts, the location of the business
annotations.html_description: Optional. For private chats with business accounts, the location of the business
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For private chats with business accounts, the location of the business
annotations.name: business_location

annotations.description: For private chats with business accounts, the opening hours of the business
annotations.html_description: Optional. For private chats with business accounts, the opening hours of the business
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For private chats with business accounts, the opening hours of the business
annotations.name: business_opening_hours

annotations.description: For private chats, the personal channel of the user
annotations.html_description: Optional. For private chats, the personal channel of the user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For private chats, the personal channel of the user
annotations.name: personal_chat

annotations.description: Information about the corresponding channel chat; for direct messages chats only
annotations.html_description: Optional. Information about the corresponding channel chat; for direct messages chats only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Information about the corresponding channel chat; for direct messages chats only
annotations.name: parent_chat

annotations.description: List of available reactions allowed in the chat. If omitted, then all emoji reactions are allowed.
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of available reactions allowed in the chat. If omitted, then all emoji reactions are allowed.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of available reactions allowed in the chat. If omitted, then all `emoji reactions <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#reactiontypeemoji>`_ are allowed.
annotations.name: available_reactions

annotations.description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for the reply header and link preview background
annotations.html_description: Optional. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for the reply header and link preview background
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for the reply header and link preview background
annotations.name: background_custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: Identifier of the accent color for the chat's profile background. See profile accent colors for more details.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Identifier of the accent color for the chat's profile background. See profile accent colors for more details.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Identifier of the accent color for the chat's profile background. See `profile accent colors <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#profile-accent-colors>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: profile_accent_color_id

annotations.description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for its profile background
annotations.html_description: Optional. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for its profile background
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for its profile background
annotations.name: profile_background_custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat
annotations.name: emoji_status_custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: Expiration date of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat, in Unix time, if any
annotations.html_description: Optional. Expiration date of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat, in Unix time, if any
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Expiration date of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat, in Unix time, if any
annotations.name: emoji_status_expiration_date

annotations.description: Bio of the other party in a private chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. Bio of the other party in a private chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Bio of the other party in a private chat
annotations.name: bio

annotations.description: True, if privacy settings of the other party in the private chat allows to use tg://user?id=<user_id> links only in chats with the user
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if privacy settings of the other party in the private chat allows to use tg://user?id=<user_id> links only in chats with the user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if privacy settings of the other party in the private chat allows to use :code:`tg://user?id=<user_id>` links only in chats with the user
annotations.name: has_private_forwards

annotations.description: True, if the privacy settings of the other party restrict sending voice and video note messages in the private chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the privacy settings of the other party restrict sending voice and video note messages in the private chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the privacy settings of the other party restrict sending voice and video note messages in the private chat
annotations.name: has_restricted_voice_and_video_messages

annotations.description: True, if users need to join the supergroup before they can send messages
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if users need to join the supergroup before they can send messages
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if users need to join the supergroup before they can send messages
annotations.name: join_to_send_messages

annotations.description: True, if all users directly joining the supergroup without using an invite link need to be approved by supergroup administrators
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if all users directly joining the supergroup without using an invite link need to be approved by supergroup administrators
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if all users directly joining the supergroup without using an invite link need to be approved by supergroup administrators
annotations.name: join_by_request

annotations.description: Description, for groups, supergroups and channel chats
annotations.html_description: Optional. Description, for groups, supergroups and channel chats
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Description, for groups, supergroups and channel chats
annotations.name: description

annotations.description: Primary invite link, for groups, supergroups and channel chats
annotations.html_description: Optional. Primary invite link, for groups, supergroups and channel chats
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Primary invite link, for groups, supergroups and channel chats
annotations.name: invite_link

annotations.description: The most recent pinned message (by sending date)
annotations.html_description: Optional. The most recent pinned message (by sending date)
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The most recent pinned message (by sending date)
annotations.name: pinned_message

annotations.description: Default chat member permissions, for groups and supergroups
annotations.html_description: Optional. Default chat member permissions, for groups and supergroups
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Default chat member permissions, for groups and supergroups
annotations.name: permissions

annotations.description: Information about types of gifts that are accepted by the chat or by the corresponding user for private chats
annotations.html_description: Information about types of gifts that are accepted by the chat or by the corresponding user for private chats
annotations.rst_description: Information about types of gifts that are accepted by the chat or by the corresponding user for private chats
annotations.name: accepted_gift_types

annotations.description: True, if paid media messages can be sent or forwarded to the channel chat. The field is available only for channel chats.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if paid media messages can be sent or forwarded to the channel chat. The field is available only for channel chats.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if paid media messages can be sent or forwarded to the channel chat. The field is available only for channel chats.
annotations.name: can_send_paid_media

annotations.description: For supergroups, the minimum allowed delay between consecutive messages sent by each unprivileged user; in seconds
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the minimum allowed delay between consecutive messages sent by each unprivileged user; in seconds
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the minimum allowed delay between consecutive messages sent by each unprivileged user; in seconds
annotations.name: slow_mode_delay

annotations.description: For supergroups, the minimum number of boosts that a non-administrator user needs to add in order to ignore slow mode and chat permissions
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the minimum number of boosts that a non-administrator user needs to add in order to ignore slow mode and chat permissions
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the minimum number of boosts that a non-administrator user needs to add in order to ignore slow mode and chat permissions
annotations.name: unrestrict_boost_count

annotations.description: The time after which all messages sent to the chat will be automatically deleted; in seconds
annotations.html_description: Optional. The time after which all messages sent to the chat will be automatically deleted; in seconds
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The time after which all messages sent to the chat will be automatically deleted; in seconds
annotations.name: message_auto_delete_time

annotations.description: True, if aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. The field is only available to chat administrators.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. The field is only available to chat administrators.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. The field is only available to chat administrators.
annotations.name: has_aggressive_anti_spam_enabled

annotations.description: True, if non-administrators can only get the list of bots and administrators in the chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if non-administrators can only get the list of bots and administrators in the chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if non-administrators can only get the list of bots and administrators in the chat
annotations.name: has_hidden_members

annotations.description: True, if messages from the chat can't be forwarded to other chats
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if messages from the chat can't be forwarded to other chats
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if messages from the chat can't be forwarded to other chats
annotations.name: has_protected_content

annotations.description: True, if new chat members will have access to old messages; available only to chat administrators
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if new chat members will have access to old messages; available only to chat administrators
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if new chat members will have access to old messages; available only to chat administrators
annotations.name: has_visible_history

annotations.description: For supergroups, name of the group sticker set
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, name of the group sticker set
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, name of the group sticker set
annotations.name: sticker_set_name

annotations.description: True, if the bot can change the group sticker set
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can change the group sticker set
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the bot can change the group sticker set
annotations.name: can_set_sticker_set

annotations.description: For supergroups, the name of the group's custom emoji sticker set. Custom emoji from this set can be used by all users and bots in the group.
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the name of the group's custom emoji sticker set. Custom emoji from this set can be used by all users and bots in the group.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the name of the group's custom emoji sticker set. Custom emoji from this set can be used by all users and bots in the group.
annotations.name: custom_emoji_sticker_set_name

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the linked chat, i.e. the discussion group identifier for a channel and vice versa; for supergroups and channel chats. This identifier may be greater than 32 bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it is smaller than 52 bits, so a signed 64 bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier for the linked chat, i.e. the discussion group identifier for a channel and vice versa; for supergroups and channel chats. This identifier may be greater than 32 bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it is smaller than 52 bits, so a signed 64 bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier for the linked chat, i.e. the discussion group identifier for a channel and vice versa; for supergroups and channel chats. This identifier may be greater than 32 bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it is smaller than 52 bits, so a signed 64 bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.name: linked_chat_id

annotations.description: For supergroups, the location to which the supergroup is connected
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the location to which the supergroup is connected
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the location to which the supergroup is connected
annotations.name: location

annotations.description: For private chats, the rating of the user if any
annotations.html_description: Optional. For private chats, the rating of the user if any
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For private chats, the rating of the user if any
annotations.name: rating

annotations.description: The color scheme based on a unique gift that must be used for the chat's name, message replies and link previews
annotations.html_description: Optional. The color scheme based on a unique gift that must be used for the chat's name, message replies and link previews
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The color scheme based on a unique gift that must be used for the chat's name, message replies and link previews
annotations.name: unique_gift_colors

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars a general user have to pay to send a message to the chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of Telegram Stars a general user have to pay to send a message to the chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of Telegram Stars a general user have to pay to send a message to the chat
annotations.name: paid_message_star_count

annotations.description: True, if gifts can be sent to the chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if gifts can be sent to the chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if gifts can be sent to the chat
annotations.name: can_send_gift
